website_summaries.verdict: These pricey glasses are worth their cost in terms of durability, construction quality, and eye protection.
pros: Clear vision in all lighting conditions
cons: A bit too big for users with smaller heads and faces

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair Gascan to replace my lost or stolen Ray Bans that I bought in 2009. I was told the optics were superior and My sister loved hers till she lost em. The Oakley was so cheap my sister had doubts if they were authentic. also I compared them to my 3 for $ 25.00 chinese made sunglasses and the oakley was not a whole lot better. Seems I paid for the name. if this is the trend for sunglasses I might as well go to the swap meet and buy the cheap garbage they sell.
customer_reviews.author: shakespeare

customer_reviews.title: Oakley gascan Matt finish scuffs really easy poor finish
customer_reviews.text: Find it hard to believe with in 5 minutes of handling Matt finish on sun glasses scuffs really easy??? Not happy AT ALL! Beginning to think they might be fake
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunglasses I've Ever Even Seen. I'm Scared to Wear Them
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sunglasses I have ever owned. I am a pilot and sunglasses are a must. Not only for the sake of looking cool, but for protecting the eyes at altitude or even on the ground. Aviator glasses are a good look but nothing will ever match the comfort and elegance of the Gascan style. I've wanted a pair for longer than I can remember and I'm very glad I pulled the trigger on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time buying these for my boyfriend in 4.5 years. He lost his first pair. He was soooo thrilled when he opened his present and saw the Oakley symbol. He said he had them in his own cart to buy but hadn't pulled the trigger yet.
customer_reviews.author: sbr27

customer_reviews.title: Not built the same as what you find in-store, but your also not getting these for $200+
customer_reviews.text: So i was looking forward to recieving my pair of sunglasses today, its been awhile since ive owned a pair which before i owned crankshaft which fit really nicely. I have to say when i got my first look i noticed the glasses were pretty big, like my grandma could wear these lol, also the way there were put together "feels light and cheap" if that makes sense? The inside of the arms look like someone was rubbing the "matte" color off...but other than those visual noticeable features, im overall satisfied but at the same time not impressed. The crankshaft sunglasses at least felt american made!! Pics to come later!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Wesson

customer_reviews.title: second pair off of Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This review was over due. Purchase these over 2 years ago and still hold up well and look good. For under 70 bucks. They even came in the original box, these are the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: LA Traffic

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pair of wrap around sunglasses that don't take up half my face. These are comfy and have great vision. Hopefully they won't scratch as easy as the spy sunglasses I was buying.
customer_reviews.author: Bme

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I had tried these glass for a week now, they are tight, painfully to wear and leave red marks behind my ears. In the description it's says these are Men's Sunglasses and it says premium comfort. I disagree and these should be men's youth sunglasses, I will be returning them, today.
customer_reviews.author: GPK

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues with the quality. Mine are Made in USA which I have read some Oakley review complaints where that isn't the case. If you pay this amount for sunglasses they should be domestic. Walmart sells Chinese ones for $10 if you want something from there. The sides are wide so there is the blind spot if that bothers you.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: High quality and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I still have these four years later. I made a scratch on them myself but it’s small and I still use them as my work shades. Love this brand and love getting it on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: christopher horton

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Crankshaft instead
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really care for the way that they fit. They don't provide enough protection because of the shape. The crankshaft is a way better model of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: LoafTheTabby

customer_reviews.title: Mine are real
customer_reviews.text: Read a bunch of reviews about fakes and was nervous about buying. Mine are fully legit. Came in a real Oakley box, product registration, made in the USA. Matte finish is fine. Mine isn’t coming off and I’m super sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big dude, and these frames look so badass, and were recommended for big guys. At the local eyeglass dealer, these frames were about 4x the price. I didn't want to pay that much, so I bought them here. I also got prescription lenses for them at the local dealer that I didn't purchase the frames from, and they're great. I've always had a great experience with this manufacturer, and highly recommend their products. Well, the glasses at least, I've never used any other their other stuff, but I like their glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect birthday present
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an Oakley loving dude. He was so happy with the purchase, great gift!
customer_reviews.author: AimieeDawn

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few years ago and I've been very happy. I was solidly in the "why would I spend money on sunglasses when I'll just lose them" camp before I pulled the trigger on these. I've had a few scares but I can proudly say they're still in my possession. The best thing about these is the lens quality. Blocks out glare so much better than anything I've tried before. Two complaints would be that when worn all day, they make the tops of my ears sore. Could just be my head though. Another is that the lenses seem to get small scratches on them pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hazard

customer_reviews.title: Oakley Gascan Sunglasses (Men's)
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are 100% UVA-B-C resistant, feature Oakley's 3 point fit, and meet ANSI Z87.1 standards. Based on previous experience with Oakley glasses, I have been extremely happy with the scratch resistance of the lens. The Oakley Gascan glasses fit well, do not slip, and provide good peripheral protection as designed. For those seeking light weight, durable and front / side protective eyewear for casual, duty, or training use, these are a very good option.
customer_reviews.author: BravoSD

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses for the cost I just wish they had polarized lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Good low range oaks
customer_reviews.text: Really good build and material. Seems like a outdoors adventurer glasses with the thick siding. Doesn't fit or stay well when i have to flip the glasses on top my head. Good sun light block
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Good Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these glasses is great. The matte plastic is almost scratch resistant. I was moving and managed to rub the glasses frame across the wall as I was squeezing up the stairs and thought I scraped them. However, after I inspected them, I realized the glasses took the paint off the wall and the plastic underneath was undisturbed. I threw them into my backpack without putting them in the provided slip cover and now the lens have slight scratches in them. Alas, they still work great but I'll be more careful with my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: They are decent
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these and they look good on him. The lenses could be a little darker. They are definitely more transparent than most sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great shades
customer_reviews.text: These glasses came quick and were just as promised. Couldn't pass up the sale price and they are plainly put: solid sunglasses. Came with The only reason I give them 4 stars is that the wide sides cut off so much of my peripheral vision, I won't wear them while driving. I picked up a pair of the Gascan smalls to wear while driving and it is much better. Overall, I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice/ very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Next time I will consider a polarized pair. I had a polarized pair from another brand, and had a had time seeing my phone screen, so I shied away. Since then i have tried a pair of Oakley polarized and did not have the same problem. My head is small/medium and these glasses fit well and are comfortable. very happy with them. I am ready to start my midlife crises now.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have no clue what all the complaints are, but the Oakley's I received are legit and well made. I'm extremely pleased with the pricing, speed in shipping and the packaging. Thank you much!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Good looking glasses, fits my son perfectly and the price was right with quick shipping
customer_reviews.author: Gia Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good shades, small sizing
customer_reviews.text: These are good shades, but not one size fits all. They seem to run a tad smaller then the Oakley standard. If you have a large or round head, look army a different model, as these likely won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Warren H

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and I am glad I picked this pair. They are perfect for him and it's difficult to find things for him because he has a larger head. He loves these glasses and has been very pleased with them. We did have to apply a little bit of oil to the mechanism where they bend because they were a little stiff. Other than that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Josel

customer_reviews.title: gascan sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for a "just because" gift. (Well and as great as he looked rocking my big blingy glasses, It was time for him to have his own) He had a pair of batwolf oakleys last summer and lost them while on a rollercoaster. He loves these and they look great! Definitely recommend! The seller is fab. I received them 1 week before the scheduled delivery date and they included glasses cleaner and a cloth. The packaging was neat and tidy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brikell

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried that they were knock offs. But they can in box and registered on Oakley's website. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Piper

customer_reviews.title: Wicked Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These frames do seem to run a little wider than your run-of-the-mill sunglasses, and that's perfect for someone like me. I don't usually think of myself as having a fat head, but apparently other sunglass designers would disagree. These fit well without leaving a red mark from compressing my skull into oblivion, and the vision is clear. Also, they make me look totally radical.
customer_reviews.author: Leets Giannone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sunglasses, even for a fat head!!
customer_reviews.text: It is always hard for me to find glasses that fit my head. I have a large "fat" head :P which makes glasses shopping very hard. I just got contact lenses again after not having had them for a few years and had to shop for some sunglasses. I searched around the net and several places suggested this particular Oakley style. To my surprise they fit very well, a bit snug but very comfortable. I am assuming they will stretch a bit after use. As far as optics they appear to be some of the better ones I have ever tried. Colors still are distinguishable and my eyes do not strain much in the sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Contreras

customer_reviews.title: These are my hubby favorite glasses. I got them at an amazing price ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my hubby favorite glasses. I got them at an amazing price and he was stoked since he lost his last pair.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Product came very fast (Thanks to Amazon Prime <3). I like the style of the GasCan models and is the reason I bought them. They're probably the best pair of sunglasses I've owned as of yet (Though I haven't invested as much money into a pair of sunglasses until these), they do a good job of blocking sunlight as well as not making everything too dark (like my other sunglasses did). The only thing that bothers me about it is that when you open up the glasses to put them on, like the hinges of the glasses make a very loud creaking noise, other than that I love these sunglasses and I think they're worth paying the extra money for!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Typical bruh glasses
customer_reviews.text: They are Oakley's. Bought on a day sale for $48. Can't beat that ! Ordered some polorized lens and great for playing ball or styling up the town.
customer_reviews.author: Danman0614

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting sunglasses I've ever had. First pair of Oakleys ive bought. My Quicksilvers and last pair of Spy's scratched so easily, but I'm hoping these will hold up much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dan A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunglasses Yet!
customer_reviews.text: Oakley never ceases to amaze, with its terrific quality and design. These sunglasses have a very robust hinge design that promises to last as long as one owns them. They fit superbly, are extremely comfortable and very nice looking. Of all the expensive sunglasses I've purchased, this pair of Oakley's are the best. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Art A.

customer_reviews.title: THE REAL DEAL
customer_reviews.text: THE REAL DEAL. MY FIANCE LOVED THEM AND I GOT A GREAT DEAL. CANT COMPLAIN GOOD SELLER! PACKAGING WAS GOOD AND IT ARRIVED ON TIME- THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: MARIA M.

customer_reviews.title: Look good but always fall off the top of my boyfriends ...
customer_reviews.text: Look good but always fall off the top of my boyfriends head. He is one of those people who always has his glasses on and who has never had this issue before.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bissonette

customer_reviews.title: Great shades
customer_reviews.text: Great shades. They fit well and unlike other sunglasses I've worn don't hurt my ears or head after wearing them for a time. They are lightweight and I especially like how the sides protect my eyes too. Great for outdoor activities where the wind might cause eye irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A.

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves These!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two pairs of these to donate to a raffle. My husband was so impressed with them, we had to order another pair for him. Excellent purchase...great price...would have been even better if they were polarized. :)
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I am an Oakley fan, but this version is bit larger than usually and is not a perfect fit on my face. It keeps coming off.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: 100 percent fake
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault for being dumb enough to think a place would sell oakleys for 70 dollars yea right.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Chevalier

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shades
customer_reviews.text: I have a fat head. If you have a fat head..these will NOT fit. Other than that nice shades..I will probably give them to my kid. He has a small head...please make the shades bigger Oakley for guys like me...fat heads!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Really really nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 5 stars. Built well, sturdy and nice. My big concern about the glasses are that the sides hurt my head. I don't have that big of a head but that's my opninon. Overall glasses are made well and they do look cool!
customer_reviews.author: Rocco N.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are the perfect size and shape for any guy looking for a pair of Oakleys.. not too big, and definitely not too small.. Oakleys are the best, especially for those real sunny days.. These Oakley Gascan glasses are as good as it gets!
customer_reviews.author: Lanza

customer_reviews.title: Good price for this product
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what my husband wanted. They fit him very well. It comes with a cloth pouch. Good price for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love them! These are genuine Oakleys
customer_reviews.text: Love them! These are genuine Oakleys. They look awesome on my husband. We will never buy from the store again after saving so much money.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieRN

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Looks super sexy on the husband
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Looks super sexy on the husband. I was worried since he has a larger head thst they would be tight on him and they fit great. He too loves them. Steal of a price!
customer_reviews.author: moosemilk757

customer_reviews.title: Love the HDO technology
customer_reviews.text: Love the HDO technology, great frame, they look like they can take a beating, but look so awesome that you don't want anything to happen to them.
customer_reviews.author: Emm Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and look sleek
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t be have a pair get some. Super comfortable and look sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice sunglasses, they fit perfectly and are not too big. They're US made Oakleys.... what more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these
customer_reviews.text: These were a replacement after our dog chewed my husbands old pair. It was a great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Zettl

customer_reviews.title: My husband says they are the most comfortable sun glasses he's ever had
customer_reviews.text: My husband says they are the most comfortable sun glasses he's ever had. He loves them! Hopefully for the prove he doesn't lose them!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice, durable glasses, but the side pieces pinched my head. I don't consider myself to have a "fat" or large head, but these glasses fit a bit too snugly.
customer_reviews.author: bsams

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pair of sunglasses again thank you amazon me and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of sunglasses again thank you amazon me and my family love shoping from amazon thank for everything five stars for amazon
customer_reviews.author: mer

customer_reviews.title: Mat black frame glasses
customer_reviews.text: Good looking pair of glasses. The mat black color frame looks real good. I have always owned glossy frame Oakley’s gascan glasses but the mat black look way better.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy G.

customer_reviews.title: sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I thought at the price they'd be a decent black film, but no, everything is so bright compared to my ray-bans. I've gotten use to these though, I like the wrap around feel that blocks out the side sun.
customer_reviews.author: sumofalllfears

customer_reviews.title: Get these
customer_reviews.text: These are official! Made in America! Just as good as the first pair I bought and paid $120. I got these for $67 what a deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lens
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this one but all of my friends said no to this one. It is because it doesn't match my face. The lens is super awesome! I can feel the different from other sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Sumet

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it doesn't fit me well
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it doesn't fit me well. the sunglasses are a littlie small. I recommend to go to the Oakley store and tray it there and then order it
customer_reviews.author: RAUL

customer_reviews.title: So this is my third pair thats how much I like em!
customer_reviews.text: Had theses same pair in Iraq and also a few months ago. They saved my eyes in war and i also lost a pair riding my motorcycle. So this is my third pair thats how much I like em!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: He had sat on his last pair and broke them and so I replaced them with the same exact style and they are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal! My husband loves them and wears them everyday! He had sat on his last pair and broke them and so I replaced them with the same exact style and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth Hinson

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: Only shades I wear for work. Won’t even look at any others
customer_reviews.author: ray bensley

customer_reviews.title: no better than gas station glasses
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these, no better than gas station glasses, lenses scratch at the slightest touch, better off buying knockoffs from China
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: They are a great quality and look exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had these for awhile now and they are still going strong. They are a great quality and look exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: bauer308

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I was a bit hesitant to buy sunglasses online since you never really know what they'll look like once you put them on but these fit great and look great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Oakleys.......
customer_reviews.text: If you have a large head like I do, and want Polarized glasses, buy these. Great quality, great lenses. They're Oakleys so not much else to say. Go to local store, try some on, then check Amazon for price comparison .
customer_reviews.author: Brandan Schultz

customer_reviews.title: They are great and he loves them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend on his birthday. They are great and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: JenSarmiento

customer_reviews.title: No 1
customer_reviews.text: No1 sunglass on the market I put these thru 5yrs of hell and they still keep working
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Great Shades, could've gotten more for the price
customer_reviews.text: For almost 80 bucks I was hoping for at least an included hard case. Other than that these shades look great and seem sturdy. Made in USA which is a big plus. I like the grey/blue hue looking through these. They fit great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Centeno

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a pair of sunglasses and found these to be comfortable. Wore on very hot days and i would think it would slip due me profusely sweating around my nose area but it stayed up and protected my eyes. So i would suggest this if you are looking for a great pair of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Ulysses Cerezo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're ok but I have others that are more comfortable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses great price
customer_reviews.text: They are light, don't squeeze your head, don't leave marks on your nose or ears, and the lenses are great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the pair I replaced except new. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hansford

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my bf. They're usually more in stores. He loves them, they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: look great, great price
customer_reviews.text: very happy with these sunglasses, I wanted a new pair for my car and shopped around and found these. they are well made, and have a strong feel, not like cheaper drug store sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: atrou8

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Excellent product. Exactly what I wanted. Will buy from again. Thank you. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of glasses held up longer then my flak ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of glasses held up longer then my flak jackets, and the lenses don't pop out. Still use them
customer_reviews.author: 1 DUDE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is going to love these when he opens them Christmas morning!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Ferrell

customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted one. and it was either this or the fuel cell so i waited which one would drop in price first, and i was glad i got this. fit is good, lens view is good but ciloyld be better if it came with iridium or polarized. overall, great value for the price i paid.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The lenses had defects and it is impossible to wear the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: BETOBARONTO

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Husband said they fit perfectly and he likes them .
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: looks cool and unique
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of I bought in 8 yrs, fits me well (Asia woman 5'3" small face), looks cool and unique, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hui

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses came in very nice package, very sturdy frame and hubby absolutley loved them, he still wears them even though he has done his normal thing and scratched them already. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GasCans are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Best sunglasses I have ever owned. Had prescription lenses installed and use them without issues.
customer_reviews.author: FotoGraffer

customer_reviews.title: I simply lover these glasses. I had a pair ...
customer_reviews.text: I simply lover these glasses. I had a pair before and I lost them... I tried others but always ended up with Gascan
customer_reviews.author: betuchi 12

customer_reviews.title: Saweet
customer_reviews.text: My bro loves these.. They fit his tiny head nicely..
customer_reviews.author: wilson1077

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Best sunglasses I have owned thus far. Good price, light weight, fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Ding Dansen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace the ones my husband lost on a trip. They were a great price, arrived quickly, and the fit is perfect. My husband could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: proudmommy!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's clunky - the frame is too prominent in my field of vision. The optics are just OK. It would be a good pair of glasses for $25. Dissatisfied, I bought a pair of polarized Panama Jack sunglasses at the local CVS for $19 which I now wear instead. The Oakleys are relegated to back ups.
customer_reviews.author: George Cruz

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: theses are good everyday glasses. they are not cheap looking and look good on your face. the "o" comes in different styles if you choose.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.O. 293

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was amazing, all came so fast and secure, maybe the package box was too big for a pair of glasses, but it was great, these are a great glasses, and it fits perfectly in any head. If you want to buy this, let me tell you something, You are going to have a great glasses and a great service. I choose the One Day Shipping and it was perfect, so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby as he'd been wanting them for a while. They arrived just in time for our annual beach vacation. He did wear them in the pool and ocean and the arms got a little squeaky. But they are light and comfortable while offering great shade from sun glare.
customer_reviews.author: ellev8

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed I never had some before
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't usually buy anything this simple at such a high price, but they're worth the money. Kinda disappointed I never had some before.
customer_reviews.author: Varian Nash

customer_reviews.title: Oakley gascan sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking sunglasses with great protection for the eyes from the sun. I highly recommend getting this product the Oakley gas can sunglasses .
customer_reviews.author: David Anthos

customer_reviews.title: Quality Oakley like you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight, they fit my head good and are not to tight. I like how the lenses are a little bigger and cover my eyes more which is great for contacts. Buy em!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I find the style is good but they are very very easily scratched. I also found them to be tight just above the ears and I'd get a head ache.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Tyers

customer_reviews.title: He finds them really comfortable and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who is outside all day while at work, loves these. He finds them really comfortable and easy to wear, and I think he looks "hot"...
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. He wears them everywhere and they have held up extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie N

customer_reviews.title: Oakey sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my son, and he loves them. The item was received right on time, and was shipped with care. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Oliver Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great value but not the glasses for me.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are a great value. Well constructed, etc. but they just are not the glasses for me. A little too big and no wrap around the ear makes for a bad fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Angelosanto

product_meta.title: Oakley Men's Oo9014 Gascan Rectangular Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Oakley Gascan sunglasses feature two lenses that are cut from the curve of a single lens shield, then mounted in the frame to maintain the original, continuous contour and offering an unparalleled peripheral field of vision. The look is so unique, Oakley customized its corporate logo just for this eyewear. Each pair of Gascan sunglasses sport Oakley's famous Plutonite lenses that block 100% of all UVA, UVB, UVC and harmful blue light up to 400mm. The Oakley Gascan's lightweight O Matter frame offers premium comfort while Oakley's three-point fit system retains the lenses in precise optical alignment eliminating the pressure points common in sunglasses that wrap around the ears.
feature_bullets: Oakley's Plutonite Lenses offer top UV Protection filtering 100% of all UVA, UVB, UVC and harmful blue light up to 400mm. Oakley’s lightweight Plutonite lens material offers superior comfort, clarity and protection against impact and ultraviolet radiation.
Patented High Definition Optics (HDO) provides superior optical clarity and razor-sharp vision at every angle.

O Matter stress-resistant frame is lightweight & durable for all-day comfort & protection. Oakley’s injection molded thermoplastic O-Matter frame provides improved strength & flexibility over traditional acetate & is built to withstand shifting or deforming over time.
Three-Point Fit: Comfort and performance that holds lenses in precise optical alignment. Contact only happens at the bridge of the nose and behind the temples.

Multiple Frame and Lens Colors: Choose from multiple colors of frames—including black, tortoise, and clear —and lenses—including non-polarized and polarized Prizm options, to enhance color, contrast, and detail for an optimized experience.
Microbag included to clean and store your Oakley sunglasses.
Visit the Oakley brand shop to view the entire Oakley assortment by clicking on the Oakley logo above.
